predJson.name: DOACs vs Warfarin: Severe uterine bleeding in women (AF, VTE), 2010-2018

targetCohort.name: DOAC new users (women; AF or VTE)

comparatorCohort.name: Warfarin new users (women; AF or VTE)

timeAtRisks.description: Primary on-treatment: 1 day after index to cohort end (exposure era end), DOAC gap ≤3d with +5d, warfarin gap ≤7d with +5d (defined in cohort construction)
Sensitivity on-treatment: 1 day after index to cohort end (exposure era end), gap ≤30d, no days appended (defined in cohort construction)
Sensitivity ITT: 1 day after index until observation/study end (regardless of exposure continuation)

psSettings.description: Primary PS: 1:1 greedy matching, caliper 0.2 SD on logit(PS)
Sensitivity PS: variable-ratio matching up to 1:100, caliper 0.2 SD on logit(PS)
